name: Armor Clash
description: Armor Clash is an RTS game of modern warfare, containing classic features like base building, unit training etc. Players can pick modern armors such as M1A2, T-14 to form identical legions. With realistic effects and fast paced battle, players will enjoy commanding their armored forces to break down the enemy.

recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compatitable Graphic card, NVIDIA GForce 660/AMD HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4023 MB available space
